newsitem.title: USA: White Pine restructures sales organization.
newsitem.headline: White Pine restructures sales organization.

text.p: White Pine Software Inc said Tuesday it had restructured its sales organization because of the resignation of its vice president of OEM strategic sales worldwide, Carl Koppel.
White Pine said its vice president of sales, Bob Hadden, will assume Koppel's responsibilities, thus expanding Hadden's role to worldwide head of sales.

Koppel, who will remain a White Plains employee through the end of June, will become president and chief operating officer of ElectricVillage, an Internet service and content provider to the broadcasting industry.

White Pine develops, markets and supports multiplatform browser-based internetworking software that facilitates video and audio communication and data collaboration across the Internet, intranets, extranets and other networks that use the Internet protocol.
